section.heading: Expenses, compensation, and bond of custodial trustee.
section.text: Except as otherwise provided in the instrument creating the custodial trust, in an agreement with the beneficiary, or by court order, a custodial trustee:

para.text: Is entitled to reimbursement from custodial trust property for reasonable expenses incurred in the performance of fiduciary services;
Has a noncumulative election, to be made no later than 6 months after the end of each calendar year, to charge a reasonable compensation for fiduciary services performed during that year; and
Need not furnish a bond or other security for the faithful performance of fiduciary duties.
